channel.title: 2017-02-15 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2017-02-15 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: Week6Day2
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: 5 miles at the Y and 5 miles later in the evening on the road. Couldn’t fit in the planned swim session after the morning run. Snowy/icy sidewalks led to a slower run.

item.title: Week6Day3
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: 8 miles at blast fitness while Miss Me was teaching her yoga class. Knocked it in 1.5hrs. 2.8, 2.6, 2.6 splits. Probably the dad(?) training his kid was entertaining enough!
